alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 30 at 2:41AM PST until January 01 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains
